# tf.app.run

``` python
tf.app.run(
    main=None,
    argv=None
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/platform/app.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.6/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py).

Runs the program with an optional 'main' function and 'argv' list.
